Sentencas: This paper deals with the synthesis and characterisation of La1-xMxCrO3 (M = Ca, Sr, x = 0-0.3) obtained from urea-based precursors.
Titulo: Alkaline-earth doped lanthanum chromites obtained from urea-based precursors

Sentencas: La1-xMxCrO3 samples were investigated by FT-IR spectra, X-ray diffraction (XRD), and scanning electron microscopy-energy-dispersive X-ray analysis (SEM-EDX) and electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Alkaline-earth doped lanthanum chromites obtained from urea-based precursors

Sentencas: Doped lanthanum chromite samples are shown to exhibit good electrical conductivity values at solid oxide fuel cells operating temperatures.
Titulo: Alkaline-earth doped lanthanum chromites obtained from urea-based precursors
